account.descriptionLink:
Main Transaction: Release 3.5T GUAC to a council-supervised wallet for listings/mm on multiple exchange venues.

Full discussion for this proposal and breakdowns can be viewed in the gated #dao-proposal channel of our official Discord.

A summary of this proposal can be viewed at the following X link:
https://twitter.com/guac_gg/status/1740391167081214110 

To view the full proposal in a public format, visit the gist link here:
https://gist.github.com/Guacgg/28766a05033f74d4606abf0e149d2c2e
account.name: AvocaDAO 06 - "It's Listing Time"

account.descriptionLink:
The purpose of this proposal is to create a long-lasting collaboration between the D3fenders Protocol and the AvocaDAO.

$2000 of GUAC is exchanged for UNLIMITED ACCESS to the D3fenders Protocol (Decentralized Vault Systems) for the AVOTARS collection. The $2000 of GUAC will be split into 200x $10/GUAC airdrops that will be distributed during the D3fenders "Chip" Marketing where "'Chips" are airdropped to WL addresses.

MORE INFO AND DISCUSSION IN DAO DISCORD CHANNELS/THREADS!
account.name: AvocaDAO 03 - Time To D3fend

account.descriptionLink:
Before continuing, DAO members can find all specifics for this proposal in the #dao-proposals channel in our official Discord server.

This is a dual proposal for funding a Raydium GUAC/SOL Ecosystem Farm & Funding an initial liquidity pool on Vyper Protocol. Funds will be sent to the Creator address and dispensed to each source appropriately.

Vote Yes To Do The Following
Send a total of 1.125 Trillion $GUAC to subsidize the creation of farming incentives for the Raydium $GUAC/SOL pool over a 30 day period.

Send a total of 370B $GUAC to jump start a liquidity pool on Vyper for GUAC denominated prediction markets.
account.name: AvocaDAO 02 - Tending To The Farm

account.descriptionLink:
Enhancing Market Efficiency and Competitive Liquidity through Guacamole-HXRO Strategic Partnership

Unlocks $70k (at proposal creation) in GUAC for 50/50 joint-locked liquidity with HXRO ($100k total), collateral for "Ripe or Rotten", and possible trading incentives.

The discussion takes place in Discord for verified members.

https://discord.gg/MjdtaGXCVY

https://gist.github.com/Guacgg/ecb4a9bee08eca5a79af916bdaf68c89
account.name: AvocaDAO 05 - Looking Into The "Future"

account.descriptionLink:
This proposal aims to streamline our council by updating its composition in preparation for a future election process. After careful consideration, we will remove two council members due to inactivity or possible negligent behavior.

As council members, we protect the Guacamole ecosystem and ensure its smooth operation.

Removing the following council members:
- Skipper due to possible negligent behavior
- Fluture due to prolonged inactivity

This is an immediate council-only vote.
account.name: AvocaDAO 07 - Council Member Updates

account.descriptionLink:
Guacamole is to forego dilutive and inflationary staking mechanisms in favor of an integrational system that benefits both loyal community members and the AvocaDAO. 

$GUAC Staking Option mechanisms in partnership with Dual Finance is an optimal compromise and forward-looking solution.

Tokens will be sent to the intermediary wallet address to set up our first staking options due to the fact that GUAC currently has too many decimals for the Realms UI to simulate the transaction.

Discussion In Discord!
account.name: AvocaDAO 04 - "Wen Staking" (Staking Options 1 Pass Through)

account.descriptionLink:
The community should vote on mint specifics of the GUACamole AVOtar PFP collection.

Before continuing: All details for proposal specifics can be found in the gated discord channel marked "DAO PROPOSALS"

Voting Breakdown:

Vote Yes For: $20 of $GUAC at Mint Time Per Mint
Vote No For: 1 SOL Per Mint.

Both options come with their obvious pros and cons, but there has been enough community discussion now that we feel this should go to a vote! 

No funds are needed in this proposal, as we are voting on parameters for community IP moving forward.
account.name: AvocaDAO 01 - Vote On Mint Price
